channel.title: M.u.g.e.n
channel.description: If you do not know completely know what M.U.G.E.N is, it is a 2D fighting game (ex. older mortal kombat and street fighter games.) You can go to multiple websites and download packs or separate characters and go against them and it is basically the same concept as the games, but with a giant twist for the soul fact you could make Akuma (SF) go against Baraka (MK.) I recommend this to people who look at the computer looking for something to do (me) I love the game personally :p If you need a download link then message meh :D
